definition.p: Each user interface object or feature has its own test script in the Test Case Library. A test script brings together short tests for each aspect or use of the feature.

partsAndFunctions.p: Here are the parts of a Test Script:

tr.td: Explains what feature the test script is designed to test, what deviations there may be from the posted specification and any other consideration that may affect testing the feature.
Documents the steps needed to test a single aspect of a user interface object or feature.
A simple task that has a specified outcome.
When testing finds a bug, these patterns show how the bug is to be reported.
